ofx:section.ofx:title: Use Cases
ofx:section.ofx:paragraph: The use cases area of the administrator page describes rules for views and actions combined in a group. Every use case is assigned to a single category to create a better overview, like the Views and Actions page. It is also possible to edit or change the names and descriptions for every use case level. Changes on Views or Actions take effect immediatly, it is not required to save after adding or removing elements.
